# audioListener

**Instance Property**

The entity that defines the listener position and orientation for spatial audio.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency var audioListener: Entity? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set the [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/ARView/audioListener] to the entity in the scene from whose point of view RealityKit should render spatial audio.

By default, the property is set to `nil`, in which case the active camera acts as the audio listener. This is usually what you want, because the camera typically mirrors the user’s point of view.

## Providing environmental context

- **environment**: The view’s background, lighting, and acoustic properties.
- **physicsOrigin**: The entity that defines the origin of the scene’s physics simulation.
